description: Trackspace GPS tracking application No matter if you are mountain biking, race cycling, hiking or nordic walking - trackspace allows you to record your tracks with just one press of a button. You can choose between GoogleMaps, OpenStreetMap and OpenCycleMap as your background map. After recording a track you can save your track and send it as GPX file via email or upload it to the Trackspace web portal. Trackspace is hosting tracks from multiple sports and regions. Several of your tracks can be published to other Trackspace users and you can add additional information such as pictures, descriptions and more. The version includes cached map support for OSM / OCM tiles and the switch between miles and km.
